description.primary: Deep Midnight Navy - Used for the logo background, CTA buttons, and main headings.
description.secondary: Soft Periwinkle - Used for the main banner background.
description.accent: Metallic Gold - Used for decorative rings and bottle caps.
description.highlight: Champagne Gold - Used for lighting highlights on spheres.
description.neutral: Slate Blue - Used for shadows and secondary product packaging.
